Burning Hammer laughs. Almost there, now! This time, he knew what he was up
against, though! He looked behind them, ready to ask Lambda is she was
ready. His smile fades when he realizes she wasn't there. Didn't she like
destroying lesser things? Why wasn't she coming? Oh well, her choice, he
thought, and continued his long trek...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 06, 2001 4:36 PM
Subject: Re: A devil with Dragon's shape


> ::Aerotaur::
>     Outside, Aerotaur began chopping down trees and vines.  He tied logs
from
> various branches at about head level.  He tied one end of each to a tree
> trunk with a small gap that he could shoot to set off the trap.
>
> ::Lambda::
>     Meanwhile, inside the base, Lambda is sitting very still next to the
> door.  Unarmed and wounded she spots the ill looking Nightlight going
> outside.  "I'm sorry I attacked."  She went into stasis lock.
>
>
